txt.en: 'It seems there are two Easterlings who control the forces in Lang Rhuven. Khatikhôl is a war-master and expert tactician. Dashat Khôz is learned in arts that seem other-worldly. Defeat these two before the battle is joined and you halve the might of all who follow them.'
Candúr has learned of the two leaders who control all forces in Lang Rhuven.
Khatikhôl and Dashat Khôz can be found in Lang Rhuven on the border of Dagorlad.\n\nYou should defeat Khatikhôl and Dashat Khôz.
'Yet again you return triumphant. You and your allies are no match for any foe. You have done well in aiding the Rangers, and I thank you for your efforts, however, our work is far from done here.'
You should return to Candúr, who can be found at a small Ranger outpost hidden in the Slag-hills.
